headline: Equifax Set to Report Q4 Earnings: Here's What Investors Should Know
summary: EFX to report fourth-quarter 2025 earnings on Feb. 4, with revenues expected to rise 7.8% y/y to $1.5B even as EPS is likely to dip 3.3%.

raw.headline: Equifax Set to Report Q4 Earnings: Here's What Investors Should Know
raw.summary: EFX to report fourth-quarter 2025 earnings on Feb. 4, with revenues expected to rise 7.8% y/y to $1.5B even as EPS is likely to dip 3.3%.

headline: Does Equifax’s AI Fraud Suite and Verified Data Push Change The Bull Case For EFX?
summary: In recent days, Equifax has rolled out a suite of new products, including Credit Abuse Risk, Synthetic Identity Risk, Income Confirm, and Employment Insights, aimed at helping lenders and auto dealers detect fraud and use verified employment and income data alongside traditional credit reports. By pairing its credit files with The Work Number employment database and new AI-driven fraud models, Equifax is moving deeper into high‑value verification and risk analytics that sit at the core of...

headline: Equifax Launches Credit Abuse Risk Model to Help Protect Lenders Against the Rising Financial Impact of First-Party Fraud
summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) today announced the launch of Credit Abuse Risk, a new predictive model that uses FCRA-regulated data and is designed to help protect lenders against first-party fraud and drive more confident lending decisions.
